name: Bombing!!: A Graffiti Sandbox
description:
Bombing!! is a lo-fi graffiti sandbox simulation where every inch of the environment can be used as a canvas for your wildest creations. Armed with your trusty backpack, a handful of paint cans and a selection of tools, take to the streets and fill them with your creations!

Features

  • 🏙️ Several atmospheric levels, from rooftops to subways, for you to explore!
  • 🔨 Vandalize every surface with your creations!
  • 🎹 Licensed tunes by awesome independent artists to get the inspiration flowing!
  • 🎨 A wide colour palette of paints, caps and paint pens to help push your imagination to its limits!
  • 👩🏿‍🎨 Chunky, crunchy art!
  • 🔦 Other tools to help you in your miscreant endeavors!
  • And much more!
